snippet: A reported Communist Party directive seemed to reflect determination to preserve top-down political control in the face of potential economic liberalizati0n.
abstract: Chinese Communist Party, in a directive, warns its officials to combat 'dangerous' Western values and other perceived ideological threats; analysts say report reflects the determination of China’s leader Xi Jinping to preserve top-down political control even in face of potential economic liberalization.
lead_paragraph: A reported Communist Party directive seemed to reflect determination to preserve top-down political control in the face of potential economic liberalizati0n.

headline.seo: Chinese Leaders Warn of ‘Dangerous’ Western Values
headline.main: China Warns Officials Against ‘Dangerous’ Western Values
headline.print_headline: China Warns Officials Against ‘Dangerous’ Western Values
